A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Mark Hamill was right to disagree with Rian on this one. Rian ruined Luke (milking an alien anyone?) wasted hours on a pointless slow speed chase through space\, included off tempo humor throughout- what can I say\, other than it was a mess. The only redeeming qualities were the last 20 or so minutes\, and the light saber duel with Rey and Kylo. I could have skipped the rest and gotten 2 or so hours of my life back. As a Star Wars fan\, this is such a disappointment that I am not even interested in episode 9.
